rooms.description: The entrance hall integrates a foyer area with storage and is designed with natural light and ventilation in mind.
A spacious living room with ample seating arrangements and a central focal point for conversation. Large windows on the East to invite morning sunlight while following Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with an island, designed with energy-efficient appliances and proper ventilation as per Indian building norms.
An open dining area adjacent to the kitchen that offers flexibility in layout and additional seating for family gatherings.
A guest bedroom featuring a private balcony with Bohemian decor accents. West-facing windows provide natural light while ensuring privacy.
The master bedroom is spacious and includes an adjoining bathroom with a separate entrance. Features a large balcony designed for relaxation with Bohemian style elements.

openings.description: A grand entrance door that leads into the foyer, allowing for natural light and easy access to all rooms.
Large windows ensuring maximum sunlight during mornings as per Vastu recommendations.
Direct access to an exterior balcony with a Bohemian style design and ample space.
Large windows designed for privacy, with natural lighting aligning with Vastu principles.
Spacious balcony to complement the master bedroom's relaxation area.
